issue.title: [Java] Standardise Logger naming
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8739](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8739). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As per: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7100#discussion_r421884919

We use LOGGER and logger interchangeably and should choose one

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8739?focusedCommentId=17102663) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
If you would please add "[$COMPONENT]" to the issue title
